faq.question: How can I make a booking?
faq.answer: To make a booking, please first create an account. Click on 'Booking' and follow the instructions.

faq.question: How can I cancel my booking?
faq.answer: To cancel your booking, please contact our customer service.

faq.question: How can I modify my booking?
faq.answer: To modify your booking, please contact our customer service.

faq.question: How can I view my booking?
faq.answer: You can find your active and past bookings in your account under 'Dashboard'.

faq.question: How can I rate my booking?
faq.answer: To rate your booking, go to your account and click on 'Review'.

faq.question: How can I create an account?
faq.answer: To create an account, click on 'No account yet?' and follow the instructions.

faq.question: How can I log in?
faq.answer: To log in, click on 'Account' and enter your email address and password.

faq.question: How can I reset my password?
faq.answer: To reset your password, click on 'Forgot password?' and follow the instructions.

faq.question: How can I contact customer service?
faq.answer: You can reach our customer service via email at ben.klomp@bluewin.ch or by phone at +41765666172.

faq.question: How can I delete my account?
faq.answer: To delete your account, please contact our customer service.

faq.question: Which payment methods are accepted?
faq.answer: We accept credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers.
